title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aapse apni kala yatra ke bare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Ye shuru hui bachpan mein, jab meri ungliyon mein rang lagna shuru hua.
Anushka: Yaad hai, Diwali ke diye rangte hue? Wohi mera pehla canvas tha.
Anushka: School mein art class sabse favourite thi. Baaki subjects boring, lekin drawing mein dil lagta tha.
Anushka: Phir ek waqt aaya, jab laga ki ye sirf hobby hai. 'Padhai likhai karo, artist bankar kya karogi?' sabne kaha.
Anushka: Engineering mein admission liya. Par mann toh canvas par hi atka raha.
Anushka: Raaton ko chupke se drawings banati thi. Wohi meri relief thi.
Anushka: Final year mein, himmat juta ke ek painting exhibition mein apni paintings lagayi.
Anushka: Darr bhi lag raha tha, par logon ka response dekhkar hairan reh gayi.
Anushka: Kuch paintings biki bhi! Us din mujhe samajh aaya, yahi mera passion hai.
Anushka: Engineering degree toh hai, par main ab ek full-time artist hoon.
Anushka: Mushkil toh hai, par jab main brush uthati hoon, toh sab bhool jaati hoon.
Anushka: Ab main online paintings bechti hoon, workshops karti hoon.
Anushka: Aur sabse important, main har roz kuch naya seekhti hoon.
Anushka: Meri journey abhi shuru hui hai, aur main excited hoon ki aage kya hoga.
Anushka: Agar aapka bhi koi passion hai, toh use chodiye mat. Use pursue kariye, dil se.
Anushka: Kyunki jab aap woh karte hain jo aapko sach mein pasand hai, toh duniya khud-ba-khud jud jaati hai.
Anushka: Shukriya!
